title: Surface Area Calculator â€“ cube, box, sphere, cylinder, cone & more

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 1. Cube \( SA = 6a^2 \) where \( a \) is the edge length.

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 2. Rectangular prism / box \( SA = 2(lw + lh + wh) \) where \( l \) = length, \( w \) = width, \( h \) = height.

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 4. Cylinder Closed (top + bottom): \( SA = 2\pi r^2 + 2\pi r h \) Open-top: \( SA = \pi r^2 + 2\pi r h \) Lateral only: \( SA = 2\pi r h \)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 5. Right circular cone \( SA = \pi r (r + s) \) where \( s = \sqrt{r^2 + h^2} \) is the slant height.

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 6. Square pyramid \( SA = a^2 + 2a\ell \) where \( \ell = \sqrt{(a/2)^2 + h^2} \)

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
